property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Pakistani doctor working at a mobile clinic

note.text: Pakistan has public healthcare that is supposed to be free, but due to corruption, people must pay to use it. Pakistan has more cases of polio than any other country. Malaria and tuberculosis are also common in certain regions.

The risk of infectious disease is high, particularly from food and water. Rolling blackouts make food safety a particular challenge. It's best to only drink bottled and sealed beverages, and to avoid eating in empty restaurants.
